aka: Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" Winners and Losers
this_title: ハイパープロジェクション演劇えんげき「ハイキュー!!」"勝者しょうしゃと敗者はいしゃ
trans_title: Hyper Projection舞台剧“排球少年!!”胜者与败者
Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" Winners and Losers
introduction: The third stage play adaption of Haruichi Furudate's Haikyū!! series. The stage play covered the Interhigh match between Karasuno and Aobajohsai.
